summary: When a young soldier leaves for a mountain biking excursion, he meets the girl of his dreams as well as a group of violent locals who want to see them dead at any cost.
cast: Jake Muxworthy|Karina Testa|Ottaviano Blitch|Chris Coppola|Emilio De Marchi|Nuot Arquint|Gianpiero Cognoli|Matt Patresi
title: Shadow
